mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRIVILEGE, SOCIAL, POSTCODE, ROADADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, PRIVILEGE, SOCIAL, POSTCODE, ROADADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBERNO.NEXTVAL, #{ memberId }, #{ memberPwd }, #{ email }, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{ social }, #{ postCode }, #{ roadAddress }, #{ detailAddress } )
INSERT INTO TB_AUTHCODE ( AUTHDATE, EMAIL, REMOTEADDR, CODE ) VALUES ( SYSDATE, #{ email }, #{ remoteAddr }, #{ code } )
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{ email }
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND EMAIL = #{ email }

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, b.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, b.BOARD_TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, CATEGORY_NAME, tb.BOARD_NO AS TRADEBOARD_NO, TRADE_STATUS, RESERVATION_NO, CAMP_NAME, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CHECKIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CHECKOUT_DATE, PEOPLE, RESER_STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION r USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_BOARD b USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_TRADEBOARD tb USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_CATEGORY c ON(b.CATEGORY_CODE = c.CATEGORY_CODE) LEFT JOIN TB_SITE USING(SITE_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_CAMP USING(CAMP_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO, TRADEBOARD_NO, BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{ email } AND STATUS = 'Y'
